name: Cytube Modern Tweaks
description: Adds a few tweaks to Cytube's modern theme.
additional_info: Works best with dark themes of Cytube and will break the Light and Bootstrap themes. Keep in mind that it overrides some custom CSS rules that the channel owners may have added, like custom backgrounds. 1-05-2015 Override questionable emote styling. Corrected overflow rules. 10-04-2015 Added overflow rules to queue, userlist, messagebuffer and Fluid wrap.
